content: outer loop of where with rs facing you fastened off foot base 42dc in outer loops of round 1 9dc in ring psm pull tail tight 9sts double_crochet s from last foot base round decrease x 2 1dc round 2 2dc in each of 9dc of previous row psm 45sts slip_stitch in top of 1st double_crochet rsm 18sts fasten_off leaving round 2 work through both loops again double_crochet long tail of yarn to sew onto foot base around x 1 msm 45sts rounds 3 & 4 repeat as round 2 msm 45sts small foot pad make 12 round 5 10dc dc3tog 4dc x 3 dc3tog 11dc msm 37sts make either a magic magic_ring or work 3ch round 6 9dc dc3tog 3dc decrease 3dc x 2 & slip_stitch into first chain to form a ring work in rounds dc3tog 9dc msm 31sts with rs facing round 7 8dc decrease 2dc x 3 decrease 9dc round 1 9dc in ring 9sts pull magic adjusable msm 27sts ring tail tight slip_stitch into 1dc fasten_off leaving long round 8 7dc dc3tog 1dc dc4tog 1dc dc3tog tail of yarn to attach to foot base 8dc msm 20sts rounds 9 - 25 double_crochet around msm 20sts attach pad circles to foot base left arm/leg securely stitch 1 large and 3 small pad circles round 26 & 27 5dc 10ss 5dc msm 20sts onto each foot base using the long yarn tail on round 28 5dc 10ss 5dc rsm slip_stitch in top of 1st each pad circle place each circle as in the picture double_crochet 20sts fasten_off below and oversew round their edges one at a right arm/leg time make sure you work through every stitch of round 26 & 27 5ss 10dc 5ss msm 20sts each pad circle and into footbase round 28 5ss 10dc 5ss rsm slip_stitch in top of 1st double_crochet 20sts fasten_off do not leave long tail head make 1 starting with muzzle make either a magic ad- justable ring or 3ch slip_stitch into first chain to form a ring work in rounds with rs facing round 1 8dc into circle pull magic_ring tail tight psm 8sts round 2 2dc in each double_crochet msm 16sts round 3 1dc 2dc in next st x 8 msm 24sts round 4 5dc 3dc in next st x 2 10dc 3dc in next st x 2 5dc msm 32sts round 5 7dc 2dc in next st x 2 14dc 2dc in next st x 2 7dc msm 32sts round 6 8dc 2dc in next st x 2 16dc 2dc in next st x 2 8dc msm 40sts round 7 8dc 2dc in next st 2dc 2dc in next st 16dc 2dc in next st 2dc 2dc in next st 8dc msm 44sts rounds 8 -
